translations.The uploaded file exceeds the upload_max: The uploaded file exceeds the upload_max_filesize directive in php.ini
translations.The uploaded file exceeds the MAX_FILE_S: The uploaded file exceeds the MAX_FILE_SIZE directive that was specified in the HTML form
translations.The file was only partially uploaded: The file was only partially uploaded
translations.Could not write file to disk: Could not write file to disk
translations.A PHP extension stopped the file upload: A PHP extension stopped the file upload
translations.An error occurred. Please contact your a: An error occurred. Please contact your admin.
translations.No temporary profile picture available,: No temporary profile picture available, try again
translations.Your login token is invalid or has expir: Your login token is invalid or has expired
translations.This community release of Nextcloud is u: This community release of Nextcloud is unsupported and push notifications are limited.
translations.Could not reset password because the tok: Could not reset password because the token is expired
Could not reset password because the token is invalid
translations.Password is too long. Maximum allowed le: Password is too long. Maximum allowed length is 469 characters.
translations.Click the following button to reset your: Click the following button to reset your password. If you have not requested the password reset, then ignore this email.
translations.Click the following link to reset your p: Click the following link to reset your password. If you have not requested the password reset, then ignore this email.
translations.The given provider is not available: The given provider is not available
translations.Requested task type does not exist: Requested task type does not exist
translations.Necessary language model provider is not: Necessary language model provider is not available
translations.No text to image provider is available: No text to image provider is available
translations.Some of your link shares have been remov: Some of your link shares have been removed
translations.Due to a security bug we had to remove s: Due to a security bug we had to remove some of your link shares. Please see the link for more information.
translations.The account limit of this instance is re: The account limit of this instance is reached.
translations.Enter your subscription key in the suppo: Enter your subscription key in the support app in order to increase the account limit. This does also grant you all additional benefits that Nextcloud Enterprise offers and is highly recommended for the operation in companies.
translations.Please use the command line updater beca: Please use the command line updater because updating via browser is disabled in your config.php.
translations.Checking whether the database schema for: Checking whether the database schema for %s can be updated (this can take a long time depending on the database size)
translations.The following apps have been disabled: %: The following apps have been disabled: %s
translations.Error occurred while checking server set: Error occurred whilst checking server setup
translations.The update is in progress, leaving this: The update is in progress, leaving this page might interrupt the process in some environments.
translations.The update was unsuccessful. For more in: The update was unsuccessful. For more information check our forum post covering this issue.
translations.The update was unsuccessful. Please repo: The update was unsuccessful. Please report this issue to the Nextcloud community.
_The update was successful. Redirecting: The update was successful. Redirecting you to {productName} in %n second.
The update was successful. Redirecting you to {productName} in %n seconds.
The remote URL must include the user.
translations.Failed to add the public link to your Ne: Failed to add the public link to your Nextcloud
translations.Please try again or contact your adminis: Please try again or contact your administrator.
translations.We have detected multiple invalid login: We have detected multiple invalid login attempts from your IP. Therefore your next login is throttled up to 30 seconds.
translations.Your account is not setup for passwordle: Your account is not setup for passwordless login.
translations.Passwordless authentication is not suppo: Passwordless authentication is not supported in your browser.
translations.Passwordless authentication is only avai: Passwordless authentication is only available over a secure connection.
translations.If this account exists, a password reset: If this account exists, a password reset message has been sent to its email address. If you do not receive it, verify your email address and/or Login, check your spam/junk folders or ask your local administration for help.
translations.Couldn't send reset email. Please contac: Couldn't send reset email. Please contact your administrator.
translations.Password cannot be changed. Please conta: Password cannot be changed. Please contact your administrator.
translations.Your files are encrypted. There will be: Your files are encrypted. There will be no way to get your data back after your password is reset. If you are not sure what to do, please contact your administrator before you continue. Do you really want to continue?
translations.Could not fetch list of apps from the Ap: Could not fetch list of apps from the App Store.
translations.Cannot install this app because it is no: Cannot install this app because it is not compatible
translations.Schedule work & meetings, synced with al: Schedule work & meetings, synced with all your devices.
translations.Keep your colleagues and friends in one: Keep your colleagues and friends in one place without leaking their private info.
translations.Simple email app nicely integrated with: Simple email app nicely integrated with Files, Contacts and Calendar.
translations.Chatting, video calls, screensharing, on: Chatting, video calls, screensharing, online meetings and web conferencing – in your browser and with mobile apps.
translations.Collaborative documents, spreadsheets an: Collaborative documents, spreadsheets and presentations, built on Collabora Online.
translations.Search starts once you start typing and: Search starts once you start typing and results may be reached with the arrow keys
translations.An error occurred while searching for {t: An error occurred while searching for {type}
translations.The Nextcloud login form is disabled. Us: The Nextcloud login form is disabled. Use another login option if available or contact your administration.
translations.The headline and about sections will sho: The headline and about sections will show up here
translations.You have not added any info yet: You have not added any info yet
translations.{user} has not added any info yet: {user} has not added any info yet
translations.Error opening the user status modal, try: Error opening the user status modal, try hard refreshing the page
translations.Your browser is not supported. Please up: Your browser is not supported. Please upgrade to a newer version or a supported one.
translations.Which files do you want to keep?: Which files do you wish to keep?
translations.If you select both versions, the copied: If you select both versions, the copied file will have a number added to its name.
_Problem loading page, reloading in %n s: Problem loading page, reloading in %n second
Problem loading page, reloading in %n seconds
translations.Failed to add the item to the project: Failed to add the item to the project
translations.Connect items to a project to make them: Connect items to a project to make them easier to find
translations.Type to search for existing projects: Type to search for existing projects
translations.The page could not be found on the serve: The page could not be found on the server or you may not be allowed to view it.
translations.There were too many requests from your n: There were too many requests from your network. Retry later or contact your administrator if this is an error.
translations.The server was unable to complete your r: The server was unable to complete your request.
translations.If this happens again, please send the t: If this happens again, please send the technical details below to the server administrator.
translations.More details can be found in the server: More details can be found in the server log.
translations.For more details see the documentation ↗: For more details see the documentation ↗.
translations.Your data directory and files are probab: Your data directory and files are probably accessible from the internet because the .htaccess file does not work.
translations.For information how to properly configur: For information how to properly configure your server, please see the documentation.
translations.Install and activate additional PHP modu: Install and activate additional PHP modules to choose other database types.
translations.For more details check out the documenta: For more details check out the documentation.
translations.Please specify the port number along wit: Please specify the port number along with the host name (e.g., localhost:5432).
translations.SQLite should only be used for minimal a: SQLite should only be used for minimal and development instances. For production we recommend a different database backend.
translations.If you use clients for file syncing, the: If you use clients for file syncing, the use of SQLite is highly discouraged.
translations.It looks like you are trying to reinstal: It looks like you are trying to reinstall your Nextcloud. However the file CAN_INSTALL is missing from your config directory. Please create the file CAN_INSTALL in your config folder to continue.
translations.Could not remove CAN_INSTALL from the co: Could not remove CAN_INSTALL from the config folder. Please remove this file manually.
translations.This application requires JavaScript for: This application requires JavaScript for correct operation. Please {linkstart}enable JavaScript{linkend} and reload the page.
translations.Please log in before granting %1$s acces: Please log in before granting %1$s access to your %2$s account.
translations.If you are not trying to set up a new de: If you are not trying to set up a new device or app, someone is trying to trick you into granting them access to your data. In this case do not proceed and instead contact your system administrator.
translations.Alternative log in using app password: Alternative log in using app password
translations.You are about to grant %1$s access to yo: You are about to grant %1$s access to your %2$s account.
translations.Your client should now be connected!: Your client should now be connected!
translations.The password is wrong or expired. Please: The password is wrong or expired. Please try again or request a new one.
translations.Please type in your email address to req: Please type in your email address to request a temporary password
translations.You are not authorized to request a pass: You are not authorised to request a password for this share
translations.Enhanced security is enabled for your ac: Enhanced security is enabled for your account. Choose a second factor for authentication:
translations.Could not load at least one of your enab: Could not load at least one of your enabled two-factor auth methods. Please contact your admin.
translations.Two-factor authentication is enforced bu: Two-factor authentication is enforced but has not been configured on your account. Contact your admin for assistance.
Two-factor authentication is enforced but has not been configured on your account. Please continue to setup two-factor authentication.
Two-factor authentication is enforced but has not been configured on your account. Use one of your backup codes to log in or contact your admin for assistance.
translations.Enhanced security is enforced for your a: Enhanced security is enforced for your account. Choose which provider to set up:
translations.Error while validating your second facto: Error while validating your second factor
translations.Please contact your administrator. If yo: Please contact your administrator. If you are an administrator, edit the "trusted_domains" setting in config/config.php like the example in config.sample.php.
translations.Further information how to configure thi: Further information how to configure this can be found in the %1$sdocumentation%2$s.
translations.The following apps will be updated:: The following apps will be updated:
translations.These incompatible apps will be disabled: These incompatible apps will be disabled:
translations.Please make sure that the database, the: Please make sure that the database, the config folder and the data folder have been backed up before proceeding.
translations.To avoid timeouts with larger installati: To avoid timeouts with larger installations, you can instead run the following command from your installation directory:
translations.Please use the command line updater beca: Please use the command line updater because you have a big instance with more than 50 accounts.
translations.For help, see the <a target=\"_blank\": For help, see the documentation.
translations.I know that if I continue doing the upda: I know that if I continue doing the update via web UI has the risk, that the request runs into a timeout and could cause data loss, but I have a backup and know how to restore my instance in case of a failure.
translations.Upgrade via web on my own risk: Upgrade via web on my own risk
translations.This %s instance is currently in mainten: This %s instance is currently in maintenance mode, which may take a while.
translations.This page will refresh itself when the i: This page will refresh itself when the instance is available again.
translations.Contact your system administrator if thi: Contact your system administrator if this message persists or appeared unexpectedly.
translations.The user limit of this instance is reach: The user limit of this instance is reached.
translations.Enter your subscription key in the suppo: Enter your subscription key in the support app in order to increase the user limit. This does also grant you all additional benefits that Nextcloud Enterprise offers and is highly recommended for the operation in companies.
translations.Your web server is not yet properly set: Your web server is not yet properly set up to allow file synchronisation, because the WebDAV interface seems to be broken.
translations.Your web server is not properly set up t: Your web server is not properly set up to resolve "{url}". Further information can be found in the {linkstart}documentation ↗{linkend}.

Your web server is not properly set up to resolve "{url}". This is most likely related to a web server configuration that was not updated to deliver this folder directly. Please compare your configuration against the shipped rewrite rules in ".htaccess" for Apache or the provided one in the documentation for Nginx at it's {linkstart}documentation page ↗{linkend}. On Nginx those are typically the lines starting with "location ~" that need an update.

Your web server is not properly set up to deliver .woff2 files. This is typically an issue with the Nginx configuration. For Nextcloud 15 it needs an adjustement to also deliver .woff2 files. Compare your Nginx configuration to the recommended configuration in our {linkstart}documentation ↗{linkend}.
translations.You are accessing your instance over a s: You are accessing your instance over a secure connection, however your instance is generating insecure URLs. This most likely means that you are behind a reverse proxy and the overwrite config variables are not set correctly. Please read {linkstart}the documentation page about this ↗{linkend}.
translations.Your data directory and files are probab: Your data directory and files are probably accessible from the internet. The .htaccess file is not working. It is strongly recommended that you configure your web server so that the data directory is no longer accessible, or move the data directory outside the web server document root.
translations.The \"{header}\" HTTP header is not set: The "{header}" HTTP header is not set to "{expected}". This is a potential security or privacy risk, as it is recommended to adjust this setting accordingly.
The "{header}" HTTP header is not set to "{expected}". Some features might not work correctly, as it is recommended to adjust this setting accordingly.
translations.The \"{header}\" HTTP header does not co: The "{header}" HTTP header does not contain "{expected}". This is a potential security or privacy risk, as it is recommended to adjust this setting accordingly.
translations.The \"{header}\" HTTP header is not set: The "{header}" HTTP header is not set to "{val1}", "{val2}", "{val3}", "{val4}" or "{val5}". This can leak referer information. See the {linkstart}W3C Recommendation ↗{linkend}.
translations.The \"Strict-Transport-Security\" HTTP h: The "Strict-Transport-Security" HTTP header is not set to at least "{seconds}" seconds. For enhanced security, it is recommended to enable HSTS as described in the {linkstart}security tips ↗{linkend}.
translations.Accessing site insecurely via HTTP. You: Accessing site insecurely via HTTP. You are strongly advised to set up your server to require HTTPS instead, as described in the {linkstart}security tips ↗{linkend}. Without it some important web functionality like "copy to clipboard" or "service workers" will not work!
translations.If this account exists, a password reset: If this account exists, a password reset message has been sent to its email address. If you do not receive it, verify your email address and/or account name, check your spam/junk folders or ask your local administration for help.
translations.This action requires you to confirm your: This action requires you to confirm your password
translations.Alternative log in using app token: Alternative log in using app token
translations.Please use the command line updater beca: Please use the command line updater because you have a big instance with more than 50 users.
